name: Dave (Rosyaev)
description:
Short Description

Dave is a platform-puzzle game with beautiful graphics and funny story the end of which depends on your actions.  The game supports full control from the gamepad.

Evil is impending to Brightwood and only a farmer named Dave is able to stop him. The fate of the kingdom depends on you whether you become a national hero, can guess who is behind the invasion of monsters or to finish the history in prison.

Create and destroy cubes with your BoxGun to solve not the simplest puzzles and deftly deceive opponents. More monsters will appear on your way, and they will become more dangerous, use the surrounding physical objects to stop them. 

Use your gold wisely

Help civilians upgrade your weapons or make princess fall in love to you but remember your gold is limited. From your actions depends on how it all ends.

Frequently Asked Question

Q: Can I do a Let's Play/Review/Stream of the demo?

A: Sure, i'd be honored. You can also use the information/pictures from the Press Kit.
